mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_doc_item_file (appr_file_name, appr_file_path, appr_file_type) VALUES (#{appr_file_name}, #{appr_file_path}, #{appr_file_type})
mapper.select: SELECT title_name FROM employee e JOIN title t ON e.title_no = t.title_no WHERE e.emp_no = #{loginId}

SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN appr_midapprover = CONCAT(#{userName}, ' ', #{userTitle}) THEN 'midApprover' WHEN appr_finalapprover = CONCAT(#{userName}, ' ', #{userTitle}) THEN 'finalApprover' ELSE 'unknown' END AS userType FROM tb_approval WHERE appr_midapprover = CONCAT(#{userName}, ' ', #{userTitle}) OR appr_finalapprover = CONCAT(#{userName}, ' ', #{userTitle});

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_approval_doc ad JOIN tb_approval a ON ad.approval_doc_idx = a.approval_doc_idx WHERE (ad.approval_doc_id = #{loginId} OR a.appr_midapprover = ( SELECT CONCAT(e.emp_name, ' ', t.title_name) FROM employee e JOIN title t ON e.title_no = t.title_no WHERE e.emp_no = #{loginId} ) OR a.appr_finalapprover = ( SELECT CONCAT(e.emp_name, ' ', t.title_name) FROM employee e JOIN title t ON e.title_no = t.title_no WHERE e.emp_no = #{loginId} )) AND (ad.approval_doc_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR ad.approval_doc_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR a.appr_midapprover LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR a.appr_finalapprover LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR ad.approval_doc_write_date LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%'))
AND ad.approval_doc__state = #{status}
